name: The Bumble Bugs' Journey Home
description:
A storm has swept away all inhabitants of the High Honey Hive. Gather together your fellow bugs and get home safely!

A part of the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Joined Together". The game adheres to the theme by joining together the movement of every bug. 

The HTML version has some problems with audio stutter, download the windows exe if you want a better audio experience.
